channel.title: falsy on Shenlong616
channel.description: Recent content in falsy on Shenlong616

item.title: JavaScript: a falsy value
item.description: Value Description false The keyword false. 0 The Number zero (so, also 0.0, etc., and 0x0). -0 The Number negative zero (so, also -0.0, etc., and -0x0). 0n The BigInt zero (so, also 0x0n). Note that there is no BigInt negative zero — the negation of 0n is 0n. "", '', `` Empty string value. null null — the absence of any value. undefined undefined — the primitive value. NaN NaN — not a number.
item.content:encoded:
Value Description
false The keyword false.
0 The Number zero (so, also 0.0, etc., and 0x0).
-0 The Number negative zero (so, also -0.0, etc., and -0x0).
0n The BigInt zero (so, also 0x0n). Note that there is no BigInt negative zero — the negation of 0n is 0n.
"", '', `` Empty string value.
null null — the absence of any value.
undefined undefined — the primitive value.
NaN NaN — not a number.
document.all Objects are falsy if and only if they have the IsHTMLDDA internal slot. That slot only exists indocument.all and cannot be set using JavaScript.
